creator: srikiran.msit@gmail.com
text:
The junit xml file output is being generated using ant, It is including all the properties like system properties etc. Can we stop loading the properties in to xml file prior itself in ant?

I request to please suggest at the earliest.

Thank you,
Kiran.

creator: jaikiran@apache.org
text:
Kiran, we have a users mailing list where questions like these can be discussed and answered. The mailing list details are here http://ant.apache.org/mail.html. Can you subscribe and send a mail to the Ant users' list? Please include all relevant details including snippets of your build.xml, the necessary output etc...

Based on the discussion there, if it does turn out to be a bug or an enhancement, we can then create a ticket in bugzilla.
